page.title: 04Shops & Services in w Strood
page.content: Shopping facilities are very limited within the area, but residents can shop well in the Medway Towns for all major needs. There are two small rows of shops in the area, providing basic requirements only. Several premises have closed down recently. It seems that there is little demand for more than newsagents, a petrol station, simple food stores and postal and chemist facilities in the immediate vicinity. There is one private school as well as one infant, one junior and one secondary school in the area, but catchment areas overlap with other parts of the Medway Towns. There is also one sports ground, though again, few facilities are provided for organized sport in the immediate locality.
